extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.

basic.description: An examination of southern African societies from the consolidation of modern colonial rule up to the present, largely exclusive of apartheid South Africa. Topics include social and political tensions under colonialism, economic development, the 'invention of tribalism', independence struggles, and post-colonial issues such as structural adjustment and HIV/AIDS.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Southern Africa from c. 1890
